comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: This regimen called the Swedish drill appears associated with Martina Bergman-Österberg. Several of her students founded the Ling Association, which later became the Physical Education Association of the United Kingdom and they commercialized her Swedish regimen. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martina_Bergman-%C3%96sterberg

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: An 1899 manual for the Swedish Drill is at books.google.com/books?id=wKAWAAAAIAAJ
